actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill authorizing the Secretary of the Army to provide certain construction on the Santa Ana River, Calif.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to perform bank protection works along the Santa Ana River, California. Provides for the granting of easements and rights-of-way by non-Federal interests as necessary for the construction.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the Secretary of the Army to provide certain construction on the Santa Ana River, Calif.
